name: Everything and Anything...and a bit gay Podcast

episodes.title: Episode 46: The Story of a Survivor of a Cult
episodes.description: Heather joins my podcast to share her powerful story of surviving and escaping a cult, revealing the unimaginable hardships she endured. With unflinching honesty, she opens up about the mental, physical, and sexual abuse she suffered from childhood through early adulthood—experiences few could endure, even briefly. Join us as Heather takes us through her courageous journey to freedom, recounting how she reclaimed her life, found resilience, and rebuilt her strength after leaving the cult.
